params.durationMinutes: How long the ballot should be active (in minutes)
params.title: The title of the ballot

returns.creator: The address that created the ballot
returns.isActive: Whether the ballot is still active
returns.title: The title of the ballot

returns.results: Array of vote counts for each candidate

setResults(uint256,uint256[]).details: This function should be called after decrypting the vote counts off-chain

params.ballotId: The ID of the ballot to set results for

vote(uint256,uint8).details: In a real implementation, this would use encrypted input

params.ballotId: The ID of the ballot to vote on
The ID of the ballot to vote on
params.encryptedCandidateIndex: The encrypted index of the chosen candidate
params.inputProof: The proof for the encrypted input

devdoc.title: SecretBallotBox - A privacy-preserving voting system using FHEVM

getEncryptedVoteCount(uint256,uint256).notice: Get encrypted vote count for a specific candidate (for off-chain decryption)

getResults(uint256).notice: Get the final results of a ballot (only available after results are revealed)

getTotalBallots().notice: Get the total number of ballots created

hasVoted(uint256,address).notice: Check if an address has voted on a specific ballot

setResults(uint256,uint256[]).notice: Set the results of a ballot (called after off-chain decryption)

voteEncrypted(uint256,bytes32,bytes).notice: Cast an encrypted vote using FHEVM encrypted input

userdoc.notice: This contract allows for encrypted voting where votes remain private until results are revealed
